import React,{useState}from'react';import'./main_content.css';import TypewriterText from'../../fx/TypewriterText';// Dynamically import all images and text files from the museum folder
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const importAll=r=>r.keys().map(r);const images=importAll(require.context('../../museum',false,/_photo\.jpg$/));const texts=importAll(require.context('../../museum',false,/_info\.txt$/));const Museum=()=>{const[selectedImage,setSelectedImage]=useState(null);const[selectedText,setSelectedText]=useState('');const[showCard,setShowCard]=useState(false);const handleImageClick=(image,index,event)=>{event.stopPropagation();fetch(texts[index]).then(response=>response.text()).then(text=>{setSelectedImage(image);setSelectedText(text);setShowCard(true);});};const handleCardClick=event=>{event.stopPropagation();};const handleBackdropClick=()=>{setShowCard(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[showCard&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"backdrop",onClick:handleBackdropClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TypewriterText,{speed:10,textSize:"20pt",children:"Museum Gallery Examples"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TypewriterText,{speed:10,children:"These images were selected and generated by the skygpu community."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-grid",children:images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"museum-".concat(index),className:"grid-image",onClick:event=>handleImageClick(image,index,event)},index))})]}),showCard&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",onClick:handleCardClick,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:selectedImage,alt:"Selected",className:"card-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:selectedText})]})]});};export default Museum;
